code: import React from"react";import{QuillDeltaToHtmlConverter}from"quill-delta-to-html";var Post=function Post(_ref){var post=_ref.post;var converter=new QuillDeltaToHtmlConverter(post.content.ops,{});var contentHTML=converter.convert();return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("article",{className:"post container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",null,post.title),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"content",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:contentHTML}}));};export default Post;
